lines.text: If the hay was still intact when the gun was fired...
...Then it could've caused severe allergies! Maybe Slick died of anaphylactic shock!
The gun. How did he die from the gun.
Right, I'm saying, what if he didn't? And it was the hay?
The hay put a gunshot-sized hole in Slick's chest?
I'm gonna say let's come back to that one later.
